column5: Enjoy a quiet stay with access to our kitchen and common areas in our contemporary artistic home. The house is located off 1604 W, close to JBSA Lackland/Medina. Travel time to down town is about 20 minutes, Travel time to sea world is about 10. Have you stayed at my other location? This location is about 30-40 minutes away.
column8: Private Second Story Room Near 1604/ HWY 90
